snippet: With no plan of his own, Mitt Romney can’t distance himself from Paul Ryan’s extremist vision.
abstract: Editorial notes that Rep Paul D Ryan of Wisconsin is a conservative extremist known for proposing two budget plans that sought to drastically cut federal programs; argues that Romney's choice of him as vice-presidential running mate reveals Republican priorities in a way that up till now Romney has avoided.
lead_paragraph: With no plan of his own, Mitt Romney can’t distance himself from Paul Ryan’s extremist vision.
